backend/main.mo: Actor manages user profiles with access control, phone-number checks, and profile‑picture blob storage APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a profile photo picker enhancement to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions summarizing their roles in the application.
Checklist describing steps, verification, rollback, and troubleshooting for promoting a preview build to production.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app setting up query provider, splash screen, landing layout, header, auth dialog, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header showing logo and auth/profile controls based on identity and profile query state.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Logo component that displays the vibechat image or text fallback on load failure.
frontend/src/components/CameraCaptureDia: Modal dialog that initializes the camera, displays preview, handles errors, captures photos, and returns the resulting file.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Empty file or placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoPick: Lets users select or capture a profile photo, validates images, and shows a preview avatar with initials fallback.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Displays a timed splash screen with fade‑out animation and a pulsing logo before dismissing.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppStyleAut: Implements a multi‑step auth flow with phone entry, verification, and profile setup including photo upload and profile saving.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile data, phone availability, and password operations via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme color variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the marketing landing page with hero, features, and CTA sections using styled UI components.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytes.ts: Provides image file validation and a utility to read files into Uint8Array for profile pictures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes current project status, issues, architecture constraints, and implemented features for Vibechat.
